metadata.synopsis: A Bhaal Cultist in the Temple of Bhaal.

0.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Glyria
0.text: They say you will fight her... Lady Orin. Will... will you shatter her skull? Break her bone...? Break...
0.context: NodeContext: trails off into incoherent muttering at end

1.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Glyria
1.text: So many since... so much blood... never as satisfying... never like the first...

2.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Glyria
2.text: She is crushed... destroyed... obliterated... but her skull did not sit in my palm... not by my hand... no... no...
2.context: NodeContext: Talking to himself, incoherent (essentially he's realised that Orin is dead and can't work out if he's responsible)

4.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Glyria
4.text: Break the bone... Feel it... the crunch and tear... Yes...
4.context: NodeContext: Lost in the memory of a particularly satisfying murder he committed.

5.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Glyria
5.text: All darkness and anger... gripping the skull and hammer, hammer, hammer...
5.context: NodeContext: Lost in the memory of a particularly satisfying murder he committed. Physical emphasis on hammer, as though he's reliving smashing someone's head into a wall

3.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Glyria
3.text: Gore on the wall... pulp on the hands... head all gone... yes, yes, I killed him. I killed them all.
3.context: NodeContext: Lost in the memory of a particularly satisfying murder he committed.
